title: Corporate Brand Platforms (More Specifically Verbal Branding)
content:
Im curious if anyone on this board has experience in verbal (actually written communication) writing for development of Corporate Brand Platforms.  
For example: Positioning Line; Purpose Statement; Mission Statement; Corporate Culture Statement; etc.

I’m looking to engage in a little offline/email based dialog, due to the privacy of the subject matter.

Please email me if you interested.

Cheers!

author: Hildebrant

comments.content: Kyle In the past I’ve been involved in CI with a number of companies and have developed CI manuals mostly in the Banking Industry.
Any experience with the verbal expression?

I’ve worked in retail and in college textbook publishing as a copywriter. That was the first seven years post graduation. I’m still very comfortable with the writing end and do a bit writing now and then.
